name: Kingdom Breakout Coop
description:
A simple 2D top-down puzzle game, where you can play by yourself or join a room with 3 other friends. Use characters' unique weapons and abilities to make your way out of the castle. 

This is a short game made for a class where I learnt about Photon.

Controls:

- WASD to Move

- Left Click to use your weapon

(online)

- Enter to send chat message

- V to speak to your teammates

Credits: 

ART:  https://analogstudios.itch.io/ (dungeon_ and robinHood_ on itch.io)

FONT: Pixeled by OmegaPC777

Sounds made with JSFXR
